DOC.detailed_description: Motivational interview ( MI ) style communication collaborative , objective-directed , special attention change talk . The present study 's main objective investigate efficacy MI intervention adolescent weight excess , school setting , motivation adhere health lifestyle plan dietary habit physical exercise . Secondary objective investigate effect MI self-concept , quality life , depressive symptom , anxiety symptom , body mass index , abdominal circumference blood pressure .
